summary: Young boy, Ah-Jiang, a school failure and day dreamer witnesses the kidnapping of a child. After being taken hostage by a corrupt family, he begins an unusual adventure away from home.
cast: Akio Chen|Yi-fan Chen|Hsiao-fan Fan|Pi-tung Lien|Cheng-sheng Lin|Ching-Luen Shi|Wen-Ying
title: Re dai yu
